about_the_game:
Cooling simulator!
Become CPU cooler!
Can you cool down your PC build?
Cool down PC, dont make too much noise, dont make owner angry because of noise, keep temperatures low!

About
Cooling simulator allows you to become CPU cooler and simulate cooling. It sounds easy, right? Well, its not as easy as it looks. You need to adapt to specific owner, weather, temperatures and whole PC build.
Simulation is made to simulate values from real world with real coolers and CPUS!

Features
  • You can be broken.
  • Your owner may sell you and you will need to cooldown different PC - weaker, or even more hot.
  • You can become noiser during time and your owner may become angry and sell or even trash you!
  • There are funny challenges, some very absurd, some funny, some difficult.
  • You will need to adapt often - new owners, temperatures, weather, PC builds.. you will not get bored!

name: Cooling Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 470
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Cooling simulator! Become CPU cooler! Can you cool down your PC build? Simulation game where player becomes cooler! Cool down PC, dont make too much noise, dont make owner angry because of noise, kepp temperatures low!
supported_languages:
English*, Czech
*languages with full audio support
